snippet: The subscription model will go up internationally and in a half-dozen states to gauge the reaction. The core Washington readership will see no change.
abstract: News media organization Politico announces that it will begin experimenting with charging users to access its Web site; company will institute subscription model internationally and in some states to gauge reaction, while continuing to provide unfettered access to its core Washington readership.
lead_paragraph: The subscription model will go up internationally and in a half-dozen states to gauge the reaction. The core Washington readership will see no change.

headline.seo: Politico to Test a Pay Model With Some Readers
headline.main: Politico to Charge Some Readers for Access to Online Content
headline.print_headline: Politico to Charge Some Readers For Access to Online Content
